entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kentville AAFC 1:00 PM AST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: -12.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 54 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -19.6°C
Wind: NW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this afternoon. Amount 2 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 25 February 2023
